dialogue: Stella! I didn’t even see you…
Why didn’t you come straight up?
I was embarrassed. You draw a crowd! A lot of young people and not just women…
Stella, this is Anh… Anh, this is Stella… I’m staying until I’ve signed for everyone.
I’m living in Boston now. I’ve come to see my son, and visit Martha in the hospital. You know that she has cancer, right? It’s a bad one.
Yes. She’s at Manhattan Memorial Cancer Center. I thought you’d have heard…
No… To be honest, I haven’t seen her in years. Martha, sick? I can’t imagine it…
If you go see her, it’ll make her very happy.
Hi… So, who do I make it out to?
